==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* ''Pardis Dhyai'' roughly means "garden of meditation".
**''Pardis'' is the Persian word for a kind of garden - the word being derived from the same root as the word ''Paradise''.
**''Dhyai'' is possibly derived from the Sanskrit words {{Lang|''dhyāna''|sa=ध्यािनन्}} meaning "meditation", and also related to ''daena'', which is Avestan for "insight" or "religion".
